name: WinRail Track Design File
summary: Railroad track design created with WinRail, a program for designing model railway layouts; defines how the tracks are positioned and includes the article numbers of the tracks used; may also contain other content such as buildings, trees, roadbeds, and other objects.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Span Software WinRail Free 3D Layout Viewer
